name: ai-daily
description: AI Daily - Desktop app for AI news aggregation and learning

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "WEB,APP" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:web" "wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:3500 && npm run tauri dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run tauri build
scripts.setup: npm run setup:web && npm run setup:backend
